claims.object: Weight of the steel tube for every foot of length
Calculating the total weight of a steel tube section

surface_layer.definition: The weight of the steel tube for a given length, typically one foot.

deep_layer.mechanism: Represents the mass per unit length of the steel tube.
deep_layer.origin: Derived from the density and cross-sectional area of the steel tube.

examples: 2.72 lbs/ft for a 1.315" OD x 0.133" wall thickness steel tube

citations: ASTM Steel Tube Pipe Section Properties - Engineers Edge
